model.name: proxy
model.title: Proxy
model.description: To proxy a service call using a interface
model.label: spring,configuration

serviceUrl.description: The camel endpoint uri used to send the message to when calling the service from the interface.

serviceRef.description: The camel endpoint reference used to send the message to when calling the service from the interface.

serviceInterface.description: Java interfaces to use as facade for the service to be proxied

camelContextId.description: The id of the CamelContext to use if there is multiple CamelContext in the same JVM.

binding.description: Camel parameter binding is enabled by default which will use binding information from the method signature parameters to bind to the Exchange/Message with the following annotations. If disabled then a org.apache.camel.component.bean.CamelInvocationHandler is used.

id.description: Sets the id of this node
